related_post.text: How to get the key of a value in a dictionary?

so_post.text: @Aspirus https://stackoverflow.com/questions/8023306/getkeybyvalueindictionary```pythondictionary = {\'george\': 16 \'amber\': 19}search_age = input("Provide age")for name age in dictionary.items(): # for name age in dictionary.iteritems(): (for Python 2.x) if age == search_age: print(name)```
